*[[KGet]] ([[GNU General Public License|GPL]]), [[KDE]]'s native download manager, supports Metalink in [[KDE 4]].
*[[KGet]] ([[GNU General Public License|GPL]]), [[KDE]]'s native download manager, supports Metalink in [[KDE 4]].
*[http://code.google.com/p/libmetalink/ libmetalink] ([[MIT License]]) is a Metalink library written in C language. It is intended to add Metalink functionality, such as parsing Metalink XML files, to programs written in C.
*[http://code.google.com/p/libmetalink/ libmetalink] ([[MIT License]]) is a Metalink library written in C language. It is intended to add Metalink functionality, such as parsing Metalink XML files, to programs written in C.
â
*[http://hampus.vox.nu/metadl/ Metadl] ([[LGPL]]) is a [[NSIS]] download plugin based on [[cURL]] that supports Metalink and downloads from one URL, supports download resume, and verifies checksums. Metadl is used by [[Wubi (Ubuntu)|Wubi]], the [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]-based [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] installer.
+
*[http://hampus.vox.nu/metadl/ Metadl] ([[LGPL]]) is a [[NSIS]] download plugin based on [[cURL]] that supports Metalink and downloads from one URL, supports download resume, and verifies checksums. Metadl is used by [[Wubi (installer)|Wubi]], the [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]-based [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] installer.
*[http://metalinks.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/metalinks/checker/metalink.py?view=markup Metalink Checker] ([[GNU General Public License|GPL]]) is a cross platform command line downloader written in [[Python (programming language)|Python]] that supports multi-source downloads, as well as checking mirrors listed in .metalinks.
*[http://metalinks.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/metalinks/checker/metalink.py?view=markup Metalink Checker] ([[GNU General Public License|GPL]]) is a cross platform command line downloader written in [[Python (programming language)|Python]] that supports multi-source downloads, as well as checking mirrors listed in .metalinks.
*Mini Downloader is a stand alone downloader in a small Windows .exe that downloads Metalinks.
*Mini Downloader is a stand alone downloader in a small Windows .exe that downloads Metalinks.
